products.title: Infusion asc Cream Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure infusion asc cream perfect fit pleated blind px4102. Their infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc cream perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window. This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee! This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on their range of images above. If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at their 'hive' or 'luna' ranges.

products.title: Galaxy asc Blackout Calico Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure galaxy asc blackout calico perfect fit pleated blind px6011. A stylish, blackout pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.
products.productdescription: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on their range of images above. If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at their 'hive' or 'luna' ranges.

products.title: Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair cream dimout perfect fit
products.productdescription: The mayfair cream dimout perfect fit offers unbridled elegance in an easy-fit form. Rather than installing onto the wall, the blind clips to your actual window frame, for a flush fit that integrates seamlessly into your window. When closed the pleated style means the honeycomb fabric cascades down the glass, as well as offering thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. A milky cream tone creates a delicate neutral, which would pair well with more traditional interiors and antique furnishings. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit

products.productdescription: Experience premium shading in its simplest possible form with the mayfair ivory dimout perfect fit. This blind clips onto your actual window frame, the brackets sliding in to lock onto your window without need of drilling or tools. The pleated style creates an attractive texture in your window frame, rippling down the glass when closed, and additionally provides thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. The ivory tone offers a classical neutral, its creamy butter-tinted hue pairing especially well with wooden furnishings and stately interiors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. products.metadescription: Hampton dove pleated perfect fit
products.productdescription: Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this hampton dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows. The perfect fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free fitting.  Struggling to cover your french doors?
